title: Senior Sales Manager
description:
We are seeking an experienced Senior Sales Manager to lead our regional sales team. You will be responsible for:

• Managing and mentoring a team of 6 Account Executives
• Driving enterprise pipeline development and growth
• Exceeding quarterly revenue targets ($2M+ quota)
• Implementing MEDDIC sales methodology
• Maintaining CRM hygiene and accurate forecasting
• Building strategic relationships with key accounts
• Collaborating with marketing and product teams

Requirements:
• 5+ years in B2B sales leadership
• Experience with enterprise sales cycles
• Strong track record of quota achievement
• Excellent communication and coaching skills
• Experience with Salesforce or similar CRM
